item.description:
Sunday September 13, 2009

COST: $15.00 advance * Save $2.00 if you have AAA
$20.00 door


ALSO: The Skyride will be open

This year, Musicfest is returning to its roots featuring the best in local music acts!
The show will feature 6 bands performing on both the main stage and side stage!
*They will most likely adding more!

FEATURING:
*** THE LUXURY
Boston's Best Rock Band
*** JOSHUA TREE
U2 Tribute Band
*** Hurricane Horns
***The Curtain Society
***Tall Heights
In The Beer Tent:
***Dreadrocks

This year’s festival combines a day of music with the added fun of:
Fest-of-Ale – a variety of specialty craft brews in our Beer Tent
Chili Cook Off – returning this year with the best local cooks competing in an International Chili Society sanctioned cook-off!
- The winning cook will go to the ICS World Championships in West Virginia
- ICS Cooks will be competing in red chili only.
- Cook-off only open to ICS members
Car & Motorcycle Show – local car and cycle owners showing off their wheels

All that, plus:
Great Food at the Mountainside Barbecue
Scenic SkyRide to the Summit
A Variety of Specialty Vendors
Gates are open from 12 noon- 6pm- don't forget your blanket and lawn chairs!







**NOTE: TO PAY IN ADVANCE - GO TO: www.wachusettmountain.com. Click on : events. This is a combined event with other meetup groups. Bring your blankets and lawn chairs for exciting music on the mountain featuring some of the finest in local, regional and national performers! Great food, brews, a variety of vendors, and our scenic stage area make this the best concert for all music fans.
item.how_to_find_us: We will all be meeting up at the main gate at `1:00
item.name: UPDATE: Wachusett Music Fest
